name.ja: <ruby>Ｅｍ<rt>エンタメイジ</rt></ruby><ruby>影<rt>かげ</rt></ruby><ruby>絵<rt>え</rt></ruby><ruby>師<rt>し</rt></ruby>シャドー・メイカー

text.en:
3 Level 5 monsters
When a card or effect is activated that targets this card (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card; Special Summon 1 "Performage Shadow Maker" from your Extra Deck. You can only use each of the following effects of "Performage Shadow Maker" once per turn. You can detach 1 material from this card and send 1 "Performage" monster from your Deck to the GY; add 1 "Rank-Up-Magic" Spell from your Deck to your hand. If the last material(s) is detached from this card: You can Special Summon 1 "Performage" monster from your GY.
